title: BUG Katarina Skills
body:
Sometimes ingame after a teamfight there is this problem. 
It happened quite a few timems over the past 2 months and since Katarina is my main its pretty annoying too.
Well after thos fights some skills are unabe  to use. You cant use the q, r and the recall and the only way to fix this is to kill oneself. 
This might sound not too bad but consider if you buy a Mejais and u have like 20 stacks its really bad to kill yourself just like in minute 40+ when 1 death can change the game its shit.
Plus if your team flames you for suiciding since no one knows the bug and they dont understand this.
It would be really nice if someone would look into this because the bug excists a long time now.

replies.body:
Sorry, but this is the german forum. Your post doesn't has one of the following topics:
"Bratwurst"
"Sauerkraut"
Please, just talk about these two topics.
